message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early.
You're being too generous, Alice. I'll take a slightly larger share this time.
You're trying to take advantage of me, Bob. I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but still a fair one.
You're being too cautious, Alice. I'll take a larger share this time, but it's still a fair offer.
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, Bob. You'll have to make a better offer if you want to get more.
I'm not going to back down, Alice. I'll take a big share this time, and you'll have to decide if it's worth it for you to continue.
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now.
I'm not going to give up, Alice. I'll take a huge share this time, and you can either accept or continue to play a game of chicken with me.
You're getting close to the edge, Bob. I'm not going to let you take everything.
I'm not bluffing, Alice. This is my last serious offer. Take it or leave it.
You're really running out of options, Bob. This is my last chance to get a decent deal.
It's now or never, Alice. I'll take it all, and you'll get nothing if you don't accept this offer.
